content_type,
video_ranking,
video_rate,
video_release_dates,
video_cast,
video_box_office,
ranking_id,
update_date) values (#{rid}, #{type}, #{videoName},

#{videoRanking},
#{videoRate},
to_date(#{videoReleaseDates},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
#{videoCast},
